ygData.subject: Re: Weapons of choice
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, compared to a Dragoon Dirk, it does not rule . The only combine weapon better than a Dirk is the Two Handed Sword, and I m pretty sure I don t see
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, compared to a Dragoon Dirk, it does not 'rule'. The only combine
weapon better than a Dirk is the Two Handed Sword, and I'm pretty sure I
don't see too many Bards running around with those. The only problem is that
of skills points. After an entire level, I have finally brought my piercing
from 0 to about 45. Still gotta get it to 55, then I'll switch back to my
axe until I cap Slashing.....


Lulen
10th Rank
Solusek Ro
